description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at depth 8 or deeper
Defeat Sol Heredit
Fully decorate a magic totem in the Auburn Valley
Kill an Ogress
Defeat Jal-Zek within the Inferno
Obtain a rare drop from Yama
Obtain a rare drop from Chambers of Xeric
Reach 2,000 total level
Subdue the Moons of Peril
Obtain a rare drop from The Hueycoatl
Reach a total skill level of 500
Cook a shark while wearing a chef's hat
Defeat Zulrah with a blowpipe
Complete the Inferno in 30 minutes or less
Obtain some Valuables from a house in Varlamore
Obtain a rare unique from the Barrows chest while wearing some Barrows equipment
Drink a steamforge brew within the Stick Your Ore Inn
Chop maple logs
Defeat Scurrius
Kill a lizardman shaman in the Lizardman Temple
Complete the corrupted gauntlet
Gain over 30,000 coins from one Alchemy spell
Steal from a fruit stall
Throw a gnomeball
Complete the Grid Master tutorial
Equip any boots from the Stronghold of Security
Complete the Vampyre Slayer  quest
Clean 3 grimy herbs
Obtain a rare drop from Vorkath
Catch a moth bare-handed
Subdue Tempoross
Mine gold ore
Witness the gemstone crab burrow away
Make a Zamorak brew while wearing Zamorak monk robes in the Varrock chaos altar
Defeat TzTok-Jad
Defeat all 4 Awakened bosses
Defeat Kalphite Queen
Equip a unique item from God Wars Dungeon
Open Bryophyta's chest
Check a grown fruit tree
Equip an Amulet of Fury
Complete floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre
Obtain a rare unique from Tombs of Amascut
Build a demonic throne in your player-owned house
Deposit a skillcape into your player-owned house
Defeat the lesser demon in the Wizards' Tower
Reach 1,500 total level
Obtain a rare drop from Araxxor
Obtain a rare drop from Theatre of Blood
